com.software.reuze

Class gb_OctTreeQuantizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_OctTreeQuantizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    i_i_Quantizer

    public class gb_OctTreeQuantizer
extends Object
implements i_i_Quantizer
    An image Quantizer based on the Oct-tree algorithm. This is a very basic implementation at present and could be much improved by picking the nodes to reduce more carefully (i.e. not completely at random) when I get the time.

      • buildColorTable

        public void buildColorTable(int[] inPixels,
